member.name: T:DeveloperMediaDemo.AppStart.AsIsBundleOrderer
member.summary:
Will ensure bundles are included in the order you register them
The default orderer generally respects the order of the includes but it promotes a few special files to the top, i.e. jquery which should be loaded AFTER require.js

member.name: M:DeveloperMediaDemo.MvcApplication.DisableXmlFormatter
member.summary: Disables the Xml Formatter in ASP.NET Web API for easier debugging

member.name: T:DeveloperMediaDemo.Models.NoteRepository
member.summary: This is a simple demo repository with no real database connection
